item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 07 Dec 2021
item.description:
1. New release of Windows DKML with system compiler and easy Opam switch creation
  2. New release: ProVerif 2.04
  3. Liquidshop 2.0 on Jan. 23, 2022!
  4. Announcing our new Outreachy interns
  5. OUPS meetup december 2021
  6. Multicore OCaml: November 2021 with results of code review
  7. New release of Menhir (20211128)
  8. Advent of Code 2021
  9. "What is an Operating System?": Anil Madhavapeddy on Signals and Threads
  10. Other OCaml News
